A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An insult to an entire generation of Star Wars fans. We have waited over 30 years for the return of Luke Skywalker only to have him portrayed like this. Disney had a chance to link 40 years of an historic moviemaking franchise and they traded it for cheap entertainment and ridiculous storytelling aimed at the lowest common denominator\, sacrificing some of the most beloved film characters ever created. Other than that it was great...
